name: Alsaahir
ability: Once per day, if you publicly guess which players are Minion(s) and which are Demon(s), good wins.

firstNightReminder: Choose a character type. Point to a player whose character is of that type. Place the Balloonist's 'Seen' reminder next to that character.
otherNightReminder: Point to a player whose character is different than the character type of the player marked with the 'Seen' reminder. Move the 'Seen' reminder next to that character.
name: Balloonist
ability: Each night, you learn a player of a different character type than last night. [+0 or +1 Outsider]

name: Banshee
ability: If the Demon kills you, all players learn this. From now on, you may nominate twice per day and vote twice per nomination.

firstNightReminder: Show the character token of a not-in-play good character. Put the Boffin to sleep. Wake the Demon. Show the 'This Character Selected You' info token then the Boffin token, then the not-in-play good character token. Place this second character token by the Demon character token. Put the Demon to sleep.
name: Boffin
ability: The Demon (even if drunk or poisoned) has a not-in-play good character's ability. You both know which.

firstNightReminder: At the start of the game, if there are any homebrew characters on the character sheet or you are running homebrew rules, declare that the Bootlegger is in play and inform the group of all the homebrew characters and/or rules you are using in this game.
name: Bootlegger
ability: This script has homebrew characters or rules.

otherNightReminder: The Harpy points to one player, then another player. Mark the first player with the 'Mad' reminder and the second with the '2nd' reminder. Put the Harpy to sleep. Wake the player marked 'Mad'. Show the 'This Character Selected You' info token then the Harpy token, then point to the player marked '2nd'. Put the player marked 'Mad' to sleep.
name: Harpy
ability: Each night, choose 2 players: tomorrow, the 1st player is mad that the 2nd is evil, or both might die.

otherNightReminder: If the Hatter is marked with the 'Tea Party Tonight' reminder: Wake the Minion & Demon players. Show them the 'This Character Selected You' info token, then the Hatter token. Each player either shakes their head no or points to another character of the same type as their current character. If a second player would end up with the same character as another player, shake your head no and gesture for them to choose again. Put them to sleep. Remove the 'Tea Party Tonight' reminder. Change each player to the character they chose.
name: Hatter
ability: If you died today or tonight, the Minion & Demon players may choose new Minion & Demon characters to be.

name: High Priestess
ability: Each night, learn which player the Storyteller believes you should talk to most.

firstNightReminder: The Kazali points to a player and a Minion character. Replace that player's token with that Minion token. Repeat until the normal number of Minions exist.
otherNightReminder: The Kazali points to a player. That player dies.
name: Kazali
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. [You choose which players are Minions. -? to +? Outsiders]

firstNightReminder: Point to two players, neither of which is the Demon.
name: Knight
ability: You start knowing 2 players that are not the Demon.

firstNightReminder: Wake all Minions together, allow them to vote by pointing at who they want to babysit Lil' Monsta.
otherNightReminder: Wake all Minions together, allow them to vote by pointing at who they want to babysit Lil' Monsta. Choose a player, that player dies.
name: Lil' Monsta
ability: Each night, Minions choose who babysits Lil' Monsta's token & "is the Demon". Each night*, a player might die. [+1 Minion]

firstNightReminder: While setting up the game, remove all Minion tokens and add Townsfolk or Outsider tokens. Wake the appropriate number of players directly clockwise and anti-clockwise from the Lord Of Typhon. Show each of these players a unique Minion token, and give a thumbs down. Replace these players' good character tokens with these Minion tokens and put these players to sleep.
otherNightReminder: The Lord of Typhon points to a player. That player dies.
name: Lord Of Typhon
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. [Evil characters are sat in a line. You are in the middle. +1 Minion. -? to +? Outisders]

firstNightReminder: The Ogre points to a player. If that player is evil, mark the Ogre with an 'Evil' reminder.
name: Ogre
ability: On your 1st night, choose a player (not yourself): you become their alignment (you don't know which) even if drunk or poisoned.

otherNightReminder: The Ojo points to a character. That character, if in play, dies. If that character is not in play, choose zero, one, or more players to die.
name: Ojo
ability: Each night*, choose a character: they die. If they are not in play, the Storyteller chooses who dies.

name: Organ Grinder
ability: All players keep their eyes closed when voting and the vote tally is secret. Votes for you only count if you vote.

firstNightReminder: the Orthodontist either shows a 'no' head signal, or points to a character with a mouth on it on their sheet. If they chose a character: Swap that character token with the Orthodontist token and add the 'Is the Orthodontist' reminder.
otherNightReminder: If the Orthodontist has not used their ability: the Orthodontist either shows a 'no' head signal, or points to a character with a mouth on it on their sheet. If they chose a character: Swap that character token with the Orthodontist token and add the 'Is the Orthodontist' reminder.
name: Orthodontist
ability: Once per game, at night, choose a character that has a mouth in their icon: gain that ability.

otherNightReminder: If the Plague Doctor is dead: Replace the Plague Doctor's character token with a not-in-play Minion token and mark it with the 'Is the Plague Doctor' reminder token (that player is still the good Plague Doctor). When this Minion would normally act, the relevant choices are made by the Storyteller.
name: Plague Doctor
ability: If you die, the Storyteller gains a not-in-play Minion ability.

firstNightReminder: If the closest evil player is in a clockwise direction, point your finger horizontally in that direction. If the closest player is in an anti-clockwise direction, point your finger horizontally in that direction. If the two closest evil players are equidistant, point your finger horizontally in either direction.
name: Shugenja
ability: You start knowing if your closest evil player is clockwise or anti-clockwise. If equidistant, this info is arbitrary.

name: Steward
ability: You start knowing 1 good player.

firstNightReminder: Wake the Summoner and show them three not-in-play character tokens.
otherNightReminder: If the Summoner has a 'Night 3' reminder. Wake the Summoner. They point at a player, and to a Demon icon on the character sheet. Put the Summoner to sleep. Wake the chosen player. Show the 'You are' card, the thumbs down evil sign, and the Demon token. Replace their character token with the Demon token and put the new Demon to sleep.
name: Summoner
ability: You get 3 bluffs. On the 3rd night, choose a player: they become an evil Demon of your choice. [No Demon]

firstNightReminder: The Butler points to a player. Mark that player as 'Master'.
otherNightReminder: The Butler points to a player. Mark that player as 'Master'.
name: Butler
ability: Each night, choose a player (not yourself): tomorrow, if you vote and they do not, your team loses.

firstNightReminder: Wake any Village Idiot. They point to a player. Give a thumbs up or a thumbs down. Put that Village Idiot to sleep. Repeat unitl all Village Idiots have acted.
otherNightReminder: Wake any Village Idiot. They point to a player. Give a thumbs up or a thumbs down. Put that Village Idiot to sleep. Repeat unitl all Village Idiots have acted.
name: Village Idiot
ability: Each night, choose a player: you learn their alignment. [+0 to +2 Village Idiots. 1 of the extras is drunk]

firstNightReminder: When the first night has ended, declare that the Vizier is in play, and which player it is.
name: Vizier
ability: All players know who you are. You cannot die during the day. If good voted, you may choose to execute immediately.

name: Yaggababble
ability: You start knowing a secret phrase. For each time you said it publicly today, a player might die.

name: Zealot
ability: If there are 5 or more players alive, you must vote for every nomination.

name: Baron
ability: There is an extra Outsider in play. [+1 Outsider]

name: Fibbin
ability: Once per game, 1 good player might get incorrect information.

name: Sentinel
ability: There might be 1 extra or 1 fewer Outsider in play.

name: Spirit of Ivory
ability: There can't be more than 1 extra evil player.

name: Toymaker
ability: The Demon may choose not to attack & must do this at least once per game. Evil players get normal starting info.
otherNightReminder: If it is a night when a Demon attack could end the game, and the Demon is marked "Final night: No Attack," then the Demon does not act tonight. (Do not wake them.)

name: Djinn
ability: Use the Djinn's special rule. All players know what it is.

name: Doomsayer
ability: If 4 or more players live, each living player may publicly choose (once per game) that a player of their own alignment dies.

name: Stormcatcher
ability: Name a good character. If in play, they can only die by execution, but evil players learn which player it is.

name: Djinn
ability: If the Pukka poisons the Poppygrower, Minions & Demons learn who each other are when the Poppygrower becomes healthy (unless the Pixie gains the Poppygrower's ability).

name: Djinn
ability: If Legion is in play, at least half of players are Legion.
